title: Comparison of quality and oxidative stability of pumpkin seed (Cucurbita maxima) oil between conventional and enzymatic extraction methods
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, 2,1033-1040
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00080C, Paper

Guoqiang Zhang, Ziqian Li, Manfei Fu
Pumpkin seed oil was obtained from three extraction methods, namely Soxhlet extraction (SE), cold-pressed extraction (CPE), and aqueous enzymatic extraction (AEE).
